There have been presented before me the very many precious opportunities to save souls, which have been unheeded and lost. Let us now see how many souls we can save for our Saviour. "They that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament; and they that turn many to righteousness as the stars for ever and ever" [Daniel 12:3].--Letter 1, 1901. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. April 14, 1988. Entire Letter.
